movie.title: People You May Know
movie.description_intro: One man struggles to fight for social justice and explore political alliances between religious fundamentalists, oligarchs, Cambridge Analytica and its shell companies that fundamentally shifted the balance of U.S. politics. Your data was only the beginning.
movie.description_full: One man struggles to fight for social justice and explore political alliances between religious fundamentalists, oligarchs, Cambridge Analytica and its shell companies that fundamentally shifted the balance of U.S. politics. Your data was only the beginning.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.summary: NYPD cop John McClane goes on a Christmas vacation to visit his wife Holly in Los Angeles where she works for the Nakatomi Corporation. While they are at the Nakatomi headquarters for a Christmas party, a group of robbers led by Hans Gruber take control of the building and hold everyone hostage, with the exception of John, while they plan to perform a lucrative heist. Unable to escape and with no immediate police response, John is forced to take matters into his own hands.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.summary: Long ago up North on the Island of Berk, the young Viking, Hiccup, wants to join his town's fight against the dragons that continually raid their town. However, his macho father and village leader, Stoik the Vast, will not allow his small, clumsy, but inventive son to do so. Regardless, Hiccup ventures out into battle and downs a mysterious Night Fury dragon with his invention, but can't bring himself to kill it. Instead, Hiccup and the dragon, whom he dubs Toothless, begin a friendship that would open up both their worlds as the observant boy learns that his people have misjudged the species. But even as the two each take flight in their own way, they find that they must fight the destructive ignorance plaguing their world.

movies.title: A Clear Felling
movies.summary: The two friends Martin and Eric spend a quiet weekend at a forest lake and want to fish there. Just like the two of them did in their childhood. Even then, 20 years ago, they were in love with the same girl. Frenni. For Martin, the crush has meanwhile turned into great love, because he lives with Frenni in a small house on his parents' farm. They haven't had any contact with Eric for a long time. One day he suddenly stands in front of her door and wants to confront Martin on the last fishing trip to the reservoir with all the unsaid that has been on his mind for years.

movies.title: Brother
movies.summary: A Japanese Yakuza gangster is exiled to the United States. Takeshi settles in Los Angeles where his younger, half brother lives and finds that although the turf is new, the rules are still the same as they try to take over the local drug trade.
